text:
Another.ai | Berlin | Full-time

  - Full-stack (k8s/go/python)   
  - Android Developer /Senior   
  - iOS Developer /Senior (or bloody awesome junior)   
  - Data-scientist (python/tensorflow/SQL/feature-engineering)
Make something that matters that IS NOT e-commerce,b2b,saas.

We are building "Her". We are a well-funded team of scientists/developers from Google & MIT.

We care very much about diversity, and making the world a better place with our product. If you care about how you spend your time, we want to talk to you.

https://goo.gl/GXXg9P

https://www.another.ai/jobs/
